mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_advertisement(shop_id, status, rank, date ,path, price) VALUE (#{shopId}, 0, 0, now(), #{photoUrl}, #{price}*100) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=0, rank=0, date=now(), path=#{photoUrl}
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM shop_advertisement where shop_id=#{shopId}

SELECT shop_advertisement.id, shop_id, shop_advertisement.path, name, rank, price/100 price FROM shop_advertisement JOIN shop ON shop_advertisement.shop_id = shop.id WHERE shop_advertisement.status = 0 ORDER BY shop_advertisement.date limit #{start}, #{count}

SELECT shop_advertisement.id, shop_id, shop_advertisement.path, name, rank FROM shop_advertisement JOIN shop ON shop_advertisement.shop_id = shop.id WHERE shop_advertisement.status= 1 ORDER BY shop_advertisement.date
SELECT count(*) FROM shop_advertisement WHERE status =#{status}
